ygData.subject: RE: Hell Level question
ygData.msgSnippet: I got through 30 in 1.5 evenings of play in Cazic-Thule.  Couldn t even tell it was a Hell Level.  Went through 35 in CT as well, although it was noticably
ygData.messageBody:
I got through 30 in 1.5 evenings of play in Cazic-Thule. Couldn't even tell
it was a Hell Level. Went through 35 in CT as well, although it was
noticably slower it wasn't bad either. Just do the Temple Top Archon or
Upper Throne Room. Kill, kill, kill.

Crier

> From: Daniel Lloyd <telamachus@...>
>
> Okay simple question here what is the best way to get through
> level 30 it is taking me forever. I
> currently am in HH killing picks but it is a slow process and I
> do know this do NOT die it will set upi
> back.. but does anyone have any good suggestipons on how to get
> through hell sucessfully
>
> Telamachus
> Lvl 30 bard
> Bristlbane
